headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

apiKey.title: Govee API Key
apiKey.description: The API key linked to your Govee account. You can obtain this using this guide.

refreshTime.title: Refresh Timer
refreshTime.description: An interval (in seconds) in which your devices will refresh with Govee. Must be between 15 and 300.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

ignoredDevices.title: Ignored Devices
ignoredDevices.description: A list of devices to ignore by device id. For example 12:AB:A1:C5:A8:99:D2:17 or multiple separated with a comma.

layout.title: Device Specific Settings
layout.description: Further optional settings for specific devices.
